snippet: A month before a mass shooting in a Colorado movie theater last summer, his psychiatrist reported that the man now charged had been having homicidal thoughts.
abstract: Documents reveal that Dr Lynne Fenton, psychiatrist treating James E Holmes in month before he allegedly carried out mass shooting in Aurora, Colo,  had reported that Holmes had homicidal thoughts and was harassing her in e-mails and text messages.
lead_paragraph: A month before a mass shooting in a Colorado movie theater last summer, his psychiatrist reported that the man now charged had been having homicidal thoughts.

headline.seo: Aurora Suspect Was Threat, Psychiatrist Said
headline.main: Psychiatrist Reported Suspect in Theater Shooting as Threat
headline.print_headline: Psychiatrist Reported Suspect In Theater Shooting as Threat
